sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Thousands of demonstrators staged fresh protests in Greece on Sunday, demanding justice for victims of the country's deadliest train crash two weeks ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Anger is growing over safety failures that led to the tragedy, and it's ratcheting up pressure on the government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Protesters flooded Athens in Tagma Square, waving banners that read, στον Σκάγμα Σκουαρ, που έλεγε «Δεν θα ξεχάσουμε, δεν θα συγχαθούμε».

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ήταν μια γραμμή θανάτου. Το ξέρανε, δεν έκαναν τίποτα, δεν είχαν πάρει τα μέτρα τους και στείλανε 57 άτομα στο θάνατο.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Τα 57 άτομα, πολλοί από αυτούς στρατιώτες, καταστρέφονται όταν ένας αυτοκομιστήτης και ένας αυτοκομιστήτης καλύπτωσαν πρώτα-πρώτα στην Κεντρική Ελλάδα τον 28 Φεβρουαρίου.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: 4 αριστεράς της ασφάλειας έχουν αγκάσει, train collided head-on in central Greece on 28 February. Four railway officials have been charged, but public anger has focused on the mismanagement of the network.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Elections are scheduled later this spring, with opinion polls showing a drop in support for the ruling Conservative government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Saudi oil giant Aramco has announced a record profit of 151 billion euros for 2022, marking a 46.5% rise for the state-owned company compared with last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Aramco is the latest energy firm to report record profits, after energy prices spiked following Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in February 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Most of that dividend amount will go to the Saudi Arabian government, invasion of Ukraine in February 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Most of that dividend amount will go to the Saudi Arabian government, which owns nearly 95 percent of the shares in the company.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In a tweet, Amnesty International's Secretary General Agnes Kalamar hit out at the exorbitant profits, pointing out the effects of fossil fuels on climate change and adding that the wealth was amassed during a global cost-of-living crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Saudi Arabia has pledged to have net zero carbon emissions by 2060, though its plans to reach that goal remain unclear.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Iran's Supreme Court has approved the death sentence for a Swedish-Iranian dissident for

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: allegedly heading a rebel group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Habib Sharb has been held in Iran since October 2020, after he disappeared in a Turkish airport and was subsequently put on trial in Tehran.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In a video broadcast by Iranian state television, Sharb claimed responsibility for an attack in 2018 and admitted to working with Saudi intelligence services.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Sweden's efforts to offer consular assistance have failed, as Iran does not recognize dual nationality.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian troops continue to hold down the fort as the Russian paramilitary Wagner Group

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: claims to be nearing the center of Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Just west of the devastated eastern city in Chassivyar, defending soldiers say they are firing M777 howitzers as Russian attacks continue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Their determination to stop the city from falling remains strong.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On account of the mood, on account of the mood, of course everyone is only prepared for victory, and not not peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It must be a victory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But victory seems a long way off for Valentina after a night of shelling.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The 82-year-old says living conditions remain challenging.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's cold. You want it cold. There's no gas, no electricity, no water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: There's nothing. So, whatever you want. The front line is now at the Badmudka River, where Ukrainian troops have destroyed several bridges in a bid to stop Russian forces advancing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Wearing hard hats, Turkish lawyers are gathering evidence after last month's devastating 7.8 magnitude earthquake, a disaster which killed more than 46 people in Turkey.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They're collecting as much data as possible from the remaining rubble before it's removed, however some of it has gone already. Öncelik tanımak amacıyla gönüllü olarak çalışan avukatlarız. Burada gelip binaların fotoğraflandırma işlemlerini, binada kullanılan yapı malzemelerini fotoğraflandırmasını yapıp Barola Birliği merkezindeki programa aktarıyoruz.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Onlar da bu süreç içerisinde depolanıyor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: İlerleyen aşamalarda bunlar hepsi dava süreçleri içerisinde delil başlangıcı niteliğinde olacak şekilde kullanılmaya çalışılacak bunlarda.
